comment.caption: Lieutenant General Charles D. Palmer Visits Fort Lewis, Washington
comment.note: Lieutenant General Charles D. Palmer (center) pictured during his command inspection of the 4th Infantry Division. Here he starts to return the salute of Company B, 4th Engineer Battalion mess steward Sergeant Billy G. Kemp (right). Pictured (from left to right): Major General Louis W. Truman, commanding general of Fort Lewis; Captain Robert J. Beaudet; Sergeant Milton K. Egeland; Palmer, and Kemp.
